alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mascotte. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Groveland, Mascotte, Yalaha and Okahumpka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent to Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
